General.Name: Chengdu CORPRO Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Chengdu CORPRO Technology Co., Ltd. provides satellite navigation components and terminals. The company offers satellite navigation application key components, integrated circuits, satellite navigation and positioning user terminals, and satellite navigation and positioning application systems, as well as video image security monitoring solutions. It also provides products in the fields of navigation, photography, videography, safety and security, satellite communications, etc.; location-based precision digital service platform; and satellite communications products, which are used in the fields of satellite communication applications, including public security, fire protection, petroleum, water conservancy, safety supervision, forestry, transportation, etc. The company was formerly known as Chengdu Gotecom Electronical Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Chengdu CORPRO Technology Co., Ltd. in September 2014. Chengdu CORPRO Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.
